# scale(to:duration:)

**Type Method**

Creates an action that uniformly changes the scale factor of a node to an absolute value.

## Declaration

```swift
class func scale(to scale: CGFloat, duration sec: TimeInterval) -> SCNAction
```

## Parameters

- **scale**: The new value for all three components of the node’s scale.
- **sec**: The duration, in seconds, of the animation.

## Return Value

A new action object.

## Discussion

When the action executes, the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/scale] property animates to the new value.

This action is not reversible; the reverse of this action has the same duration but does not change anything.

## Creating Actions That Change a Node’s Scale

- **scale(by:duration:)**: Creates an action that uniformly changes the scale factor of a node by a relative value.
